name: RainStormforSleep
0:
”Alexa open rain storm”
”Alexa ask rain storm to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain storm
des:
Let the soft sounds of a rain storm lull you right to sleep. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Rain Storm, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to leave on while you are asleep, to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
